attributes.action: Play a part in history by taking a look at the Crest on our passports.
attributes.additional_details:
Considering what the good people of Scotland have been put through recently It's the least we can do.

I can't help but wonder if this is why the Scott's are so much better at spotting Unicorns than the English.
attributes.background:
Notice it has two animals in the crest. One a English Lion the other the Scottish Unicorn.
The Unicorn has had its crown forced down over its head around it's throat and is  shackled down.
Imagine how you would feel if this represented your home country.

It's 2019, Time to set the Unicorn free.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
